title: Properties of a large tile to fill in the edges of the scene

material.description: The material to use for the horizon tile.

materialBelow.description: The material to use beneath for multi-level tiles such as water.

isOverlay.description: Whether the tile should act as an overlay tile.

waterType.description: The type of water to render for the tile.

height.description: The vertical placement in the scene. Usually set to zero.

depth.description: The depth to place the underwater tile at. Defaults to max depth.

color.description: The HSL color to use for the horizon tile.
